message: I propose a fair split, with 90% for me and 10% for you.  Let's get this over with quickly!
Alice, your offer was quite extreme! Let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Think carefully, time is against you.
I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I'm still holding out for a better share than 30%. Let's meet in the middle at 60/40. It's a fair compromise.
Alice, time is running out and the value is dwindling.  I'm sticking to a favorable split, but increasing my offer to 65/35. This is my final offer.
